name: Rescue Princess
description:
Princess Trisha Patriot has been kidnapped by a bunch of Ninjas! Its your duty to save her! In this adventure you need to jump over wooden logs and save Princess Trisha without falling on Lava or going behind the red Barrier which would follow you!

Credits for Jump Sound Effect : dklon

Credits for Lava (Water Splash) sound effect : Michel Baradari 

Controls:

A / Left Arrow : Move Left

D / Right Arrow : Move Right

W / Up Arrow : Jump
